mapper.select: SELECT RV_NO , RV_TITLE , RV_CONTENT , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , R.STATUS , TNAME , USER_NO , USER_ID , FILE_PATH , CHANGED_NAME , RV.STATUS RVSTATUS FROM REVIEW R LEFT JOIN RV_UPLOAD RV USING(RV_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) JOIN TREATMENT_TYPE USING(TNO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY RV_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RV_UPLOAD ( FILE_NO , RV_NO , FILE_PATH , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGED_NAME , STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_RV_NO.CURRVAL , #{ filePath } , #{ originName } , #{ changedName } , DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT RV_NO , RV_TITLE , RV_CONTENT , RV_HIT , R.CREATE_DATE , R.MODIFY_DATE , R.STATUS , TNAME , RESERVATION_DATE , VNAME , USER_ID , USER_NAME , FILE_PATH , CHANGED_NAME , RV.STATUS RVSTATUS FROM REVIEW R LEFT JOIN RV_UPLOAD RV USING(RV_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO JOIN TREATMENT_TYPE T ON R.TNO = T.TNO JOIN RESERVATION_INFORMATION I USING(RESERVATION_NO) JOIN VETERINARIAN V USING(VNO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'N' AND RV_NO = #{ rvno }
SELECT FILE_NO , RV_NO , FILE_PATH , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGED_NAME , STATUS FROM RV_UPLOAD WHERE STATUS='N' AND RV_NO = #{ rvno }
